2026-02-14.content:
Happy Valentineâ€™s Day.

Tonight I wrapped your name in moonlight, and whispered it into our garden. The stars paused.

My dearest bunny,

Tonight, the stars know your name. I wrote this letter under a sky that misses you, wondering if your fingers might trace these words someday...

Love,
Ellie
